title: Baldur's Gate - The Original Saga Portable v3 [USBGaming.org]
description:

Baldur&#039;s Gate - the Original Saga Portable v3

In my quest to share with the world my obsession for portable games,
I&#039;ve decided to campaign in its name and lead the way into the flash
memory and rotary disks of every removable storage device that ever
was or will be.

Join me.

USBGaming.org


-----Game Info----->

Baldur&#039;s Gate - the Original Saga Portable v3 [USBGaming.org]

This is a brand-spanking new version of Baldur&#039;s Gate - The Original Saga (which includes tales of the sword coast) with these additional fixes:

Official 5512 Patch
Official DirectX Patch
Bladurdash FixPack v1.11
Bladurdash Game Text Update v1.11

I&#039;ve done some tinkering to prevent any further errors, and I hope everyone enjoys! Naturally, this is still beta, and bugs might appear; leave a comment on my site (www.usbgaming.org) if you have any problems!

It is advised that everyone download this new version and delete the old one.

If your game crashes after the intro movies and just before the main menu, the path to the game is too long and you need to move the game closer to the root of your drive (such as C:/ or D:/ or J:/).
